name: Tier 1
description: Lowest tier for testing / proof of concept, early development and non-existent traffic.

name: Tier 2
description: For production apps with low to medium file upload needs.
support: Founder responds to your emails within 1 hour.

name: Tier 3
description: If your users are doing lot's of (large) file uploads then this is the plan for you!
support: Founder will call you if you have an issue and fix it with you.
features: Migrate from Cloudinary or UploadFast - (Coming soon)
